articles.description: The trailer for "I Wanna Dance with Somebody" recreates the singer's most iconic moments. Some fans, however, fear the movie may be too superficial.
articles.content:
A movie based on the life of late pop icon Whitney Houston is bound for the big screen this winter. 
Directed by Kasi Lemmons and due out Dec. 21, I Wanna Dance with Somebody is billed as an emotion… [+2300 chars]
